title: Pinnacle Studio Ultimate 22.0.1.146 64 Bit + Content Pack[BabuPC
description: http://babupc.com.html The Ultimate Video-Editing Software. Your movies look their best from every angle with the power of Pinnacle Studio 21 Ultimate and its new Multi-Camera Editor. View and edit footage from up to 6 cameras, and align clips automatically with Audio Syncing. Easily lower background sound to keep dialog and narration clear with new Audio Ducking. Video editing and Live Screen Capture – New! Motion Tracking with mosaic blur – New! Stop Motion Animation – New! 360° video editing – New! Premium effects from NewBlue – Enhanced! Multi-camera editing – 2,000+ effects, transitions and templates – Unlimited-track, HD, 3D and 4K video editing Advanced video editing Edit with precision with key frame-based controls, edit on unlimited tracks in 4K, HD and 3D and easily customize your workspace. Creative control Add impact with 2,000+ 2D and 3D effects. Create amazing animations with Stop Motion Animation and superimpose people over different backgrounds using the Green Screen effect. Live Screen Capture Easily create tutorial videos or how-to demonstrations with Live Screen Capture. Capture your screen, system audio and voiceover, and then import it into the timeline to edit and refine
